__TOC__

* Event: This month's Madison Ubuntu Hour was March 16. This event is on the third Saturday of each month, and is hosted by <nowiki>[[http://madisonlinux.org/|Madison LUG]]</nowiki>. The next Madison Ubuntu Hour will be April 20.

* Event: Rick and <nowiki>[[Cheesehead|Ian]]</nowiki> held an outreach seminar in Wausau. <nowiki>[[http://www.wausaudailyherald.com/article/20120323/WDH0101/203230457/Marathon-County-Public-Library-offers-Ubuntu-conference|Newspaper story]]</nowiki>. Eight new users attended, fewer than expected. The attendees asked sophisticated questions, and feedback was very positive. Special thanks to Rick for organizing the event and preparing such fabulous presentations!

* Monthly Meeting: There was no monthly meeting on IRC this month.
